title: Netflix content watching worldwide by device 2017
summary: This chart shows the percentage of Netflix represented in watching worldwide in Netflix .
\\n From the chart we see that highest percentage of Netflix are in the Mobile Platform at 70 % .
\\n The lowest content is in Tablet at 5 % followed behind by Television at 70 % and then not far behind by PC/laptop Platform .
gold: The figure shows the share of time spent watching Netflix worldwide in 2017 , by device . According to the source , 70 percent of content streamed on Netflix worldwide in 2017 was via a connected TV .
